00027 int ResponseCallbackUpdate::response(StaticBuffer &ext) {
00028   CommHeader header;
00029   header.initialize_from_request_header(m_event_ptr->header);
00030   CommBufPtr cbp(new CommBuf( header, 4, ext));
00031   cbp->append_i32(Error::OK);
00032   return m_comm->send_response(m_event_ptr->addr, cbp);
